info.name: Kevin Selwyn
info.title: Frontend Engineer
info.profile: Kevin is a highly motivated self-starter with 8+ years of professional web development experience. He has a tenacious drive to learn and make the web better.
info.interests: Kevin is passionate about music, The Legend of Zelda, and Corgis.

employment.title: frontend engineer
description: Testing, consuming, and documenting public and internal web APIs

description: Maintaining and improving an enterprise-level website

employment.title: sr. web developer
description: Developing websites, blogs, landing pages, and HTML emails for clients in the technology sector
Working from Photoshop files to build HTML documents using HTML/PHP, CSS, and Javascript
Performing SEO keyword research and optimization
Training clients on proper use, care, and customization of their website or blog
Adjusting creative quickly and efficiently in real time for client approval
Aiding in the fulfillment of dimensional mail campaigns (postage, shipping)

employment.title: freelance web developer
description: Created and maintained websites in a timely fashion
